text: Philippe Briand (born October 26, 1960 in Tours) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Indre-et-Loire department, and is a member of The Republicans. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:People from Tours, France Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:The Strong Right Category:Gaullism, a way forward for France Category:Secretaries of State of France Category:Mayors of places in Centre-Val de Loire Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Philippe Briand
